tidbits.title: Archipelago Wonders
tidbits.description: Indonesia is an archipelago with thousands of islands, offering diverse landscapes, from lush rainforests and volcanoes to stunning beaches.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: The country embraces cultural diversity, seen in its various ethnic groups, languages, traditions, and rich art forms like batik and gamelan music.

tidbits.title: Biodiversity Hotspot
tidbits.description: Indonesia is a biodiversity hotspot, housing unique species like orangutans and Komodo dragons, making it a paradise for nature enthusiasts.
